name: My First game (BadTrombonist06YT)
description:
This is a bad game made by Bad Trombonist06 on YouTube, go watch the video of me m aking this! Bad Trombonist06 - YouTube 

Pls Sub :(

Alright to  Move its WASD and the mouse

grenade - G

 reload - R 

Run - Shift

Shoot  - left click

Knife - Q

Holster your weapon - E

 I couldnt make a start or exit screen so if you  fall off the side or want to   close the game   use task manager or CTRL+ALT+DEL

 That is all enjoy
